terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app
Class PrintFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app.PrintFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class PrintFrame
extends java.awt.Frame

This is a frame showing a static image as a print preview. A print button allows the image to be printed.

See Also:
Serialized Form
